title: EluguHcman
author: EluguHcman
content: I get som kind reasoning 4rm dis fact wia intrestinmeaninful topics & replies fit fech pesin Merit (s).So I tink e go be welcom devlopment if da kind intrestin & meaninful topics & replies 2 fit fit giv "Hearts‚ô•Ô∏è" or "Likes üëç".Dis go b a time say pesin wish 2 giv pesin Merit 4 a particular Topic or Reply bt bcos him no gt Merit or no get at ¬†all at all 2 giv out, so na jst 2 appreciate da interesting write up.Dis devlopment go dey point 2 encourage d writer 2 continue it up. & we all knw knw say we dey always like 2 put fire 4 tins we dey do way dem dey take clap 4 us jst as dem dey say apreciation na aplications 4 ¬†more 2 com.Evn dou dis devlopment no go count 2 giv credit 2 d acount bt at least e go boost d persin way write am & 2 let a kne say him dey on point.Encourage na courage of mora booster oh and we know say Merits na wetin we all dey pursue cuz e be like ticket. So wen man don post post post and account no dey shake like say peple self dey dia wit u, e fit cuz man weakness or seeing urself like say na only u jst dey jingle up and down alone.This na just new development thought way com my head so to fit encourage ourselves oh while we still dey push til we gt d best.I say my bring dis up here cuz men way Sabi dey hia maybe dem fit decorate am wella go extra mile for approval.
